FuncDef:
The arp direct-route delay command sets a delay in advertising ARP Vlink direct routes on an interface.
The undo arp direct-route delay command deletes the delay in advertising ARP Vlink direct routes. The arp direct-route delay command sets a delay in advertising ARP Vlink direct routes on an interface. The undo arp direct-route delay command deletes the delay in advertising ARP Vlink direct routes. By default, no delay is set for advertising ARP Vlink direct routes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a delay in advertising ARP Vlink direct routes on an interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 3600, in seconds.

ExtraInfo: The arp direct-route delay command sets a delay in advertising ARP Vlink direct routes on an interface.
